item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_nivo_slider nivo_style="nivo-slider-01" slide_group="%5B%7B%22image%22%3A%221365%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%221369%22%7D%5D" width="750" height="396"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Highlights"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-instagram%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EClient%3A%3C%2Fb%3E%20Shoe%20Stars%20Germany%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-instagram%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EPartners%3A%3C%2Fb%3E%20TinkerShoe%20Ltd.%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-instagram%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20duration%3A%3C%2Fb%3E%20May%202016%20-%20Aug%202016%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-instagram%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20category%3A%3C%2Fb%3E%20Mergers%20%26%20Acquisitions%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Overview"][vc_column_text]Every company needs a clear vision, mission and strategy. Strategy is a tool to achieve your vision. Rarely a company defines a 10-year strategy. Before, that was pretty standard procedure. What has changed? It has to do with global market changes and fluctuations. Does that mean that no company should define a 10-year strategy? Of course not. The aim is to define s strategy in a way that it is flexible enough to withstand market changes and adapts to new opportunities and risk.
The same is when creating a website. Same rules applies. You need to have a strategy for your website. What is it's purpose? Presentation only, gaining customers, increasing sales or something else. Once you define your website strategy start with content creation that will support that strategy. Be sure to have in mind that you need to align your content and strategy with your customers, their needs and expectations. After all you are not doing your website for you, but for them.
So why have we decided to make multi-niche consulting theme? Well, not all of business are in finance sector. Many consulting businesses are in tourism industry, IT security and so on. So a finance oriented site will not do the trick. You need a layout that is suited for your niche. Everything, from colors, images, content and feel must be aligned to suite your niche. That's why we decided to create a consulting theme that will be oriented to more than just one niche and deliver you the desired result.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Activities"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Crafting%20competitive%20business%20strategy%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Defining%20business%20strategy%20implementation%20and%20execution%20plan%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Detailed%20activities%20in%20business%20functions%20and%20process%20optimization%20that%20supports%20new%20business%20strategy%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22New%20marketing%20and%20branding%20strategy%20creation%20and%20implementation%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Results"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Business%20functions%20and%20processes%20optimization%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Clear%20company%20vision%20and%20steps%20to%20achieve%20that%20vision%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Defined%20performance%20matrix%20for%20management%20and%20control%20of%20conducted%20activities%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Better%20understanding%20of%20customer%20needs%20and%20overall%20customer%20experience.%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Strategy is a tool to achieve your vision. Rarely a company defines a 10-year strategy. Before, that was pretty standard procedure. What has changed? It has to do with global market changes and fluctuations. Does that mean that no company should define a 10-year strategy? Of course not. The aim is to define s strategy in a way that it is flexible enough to withstand market changes and adapts to new opportunities and risk.
The same is when creating a website. Same rules applies. You need to have a strategy for your website. What is it's purpose? Presentation only, gaining customers, increasing sales or something else. Once you define your website strategy start with content creation that will support that strategy. Be sure to have in mind that you need to align your content and strategy with your customers, their needs and expectations. After all you are not doing your website for you, but for them.
So why have we decided to make multi-niche consulting theme? Well, not all of business are in finance sector. Many consulting businesses are in tourism industry, IT security and so on. So a finance oriented site will not do the trick. You need a layout that is suited for your niche. Everything, from colors, images, content and feel must be aligned to suite your niche. That's why we decided to create a consulting theme that will be oriented to more than just one niche and deliver you the desired result.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Activities"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Crafting%20competitive%20business%20strategy%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Defining%20business%20strategy%20implementation%20and%20execution%20plan%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Detailed%20activities%20in%20business%20functions%20and%20process%20optimization%20that%20supports%20new%20business%20strategy%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22New%20marketing%20and%20branding%20strategy%20creation%20and%20implementation%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Results"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Business%20functions%20and%20processes%20optimization%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Clear%20company%20vision%20and%20steps%20to%20achieve%20that%20vision%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Defined%20performance%20matrix%20for%20management%20and%20control%20of%20conducted%20activities%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Better%20understanding%20of%20customer%20needs%20and%20overall%20customer%20experience.%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Strategy is a tool to achieve your vision. Rarely a company defines a 10-year strategy. Before, that was pretty standard procedure. What has changed? It has to do with global market changes and fluctuations. Does that mean that no company should define a 10-year strategy? Of course not. The aim is to define s strategy in a way that it is flexible enough to withstand market changes and adapts to new opportunities and risk.
The same is when creating a website. Same rules applies. You need to have a strategy for your website. What is it's purpose? Presentation only, gaining customers, increasing sales or something else. Once you define your website strategy start with content creation that will support that strategy. item.title: ConsultingPress Resolution for 2017 More Niche Themes
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
ConsultingPress Resolution for 2017 More Niche Themes

Many say niche themes are dead, or will be soon. The mega themes will rule the market. Although we agree to some point, we still believe in niche themes. Why? Because they serve a purpose, real purpose. ConsultingPress is for example suitable for consulting niche and it's a perfect choice for any consulting company. Why is ConsultingPress better choice than other bloated multi-use themes with 200+ layouts? Because you need simple, fast, SEO friendly and lightweight site, for starters. You need a theme that will give you enough flexibility and functionality to accomplish your needs, not three thousand options you will never use and that will make your site cluttered and slow. Another reason is that when you create a niche theme, you need to investigate the industry field in which you are entering with your theme. That means examining wide range of real companies, their websites, their needs and areas for improvements. What that means? When you buy a niche theme you can be sure that it is the best possible solution for your site. It's already SEO friendly, with real content, so you can actually read the content, not lorem lpsum. Of course, you will change that content, but you will see in real example what keywords are used, how many times, how images are named and why. You get a complete solution and you can set up your site with just a few clicks. The site built upon lightweight niche theme will be fast, optimized and have good ranking, which is very important.
item.excerpt:encoded: Many say niche themes are dead, or will be soon. The mega themes will rule the market.

item.title: 5 Essential Tips on Why and How to Invest in Digital Marketing
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Want to Know More on How to Invest in Digital Marketing? Here are Some Great Tips.

Digital marketing is becoming one of the most important activities for any company. Weather you are a small business owner working with plumbing or large scale logistics company, you need to invest in digital marketing. Some people think in a way, ok I will make myself a website, nothing fancy, just to have one and that is digital marketing. Well, they are wrong. There is much more to digital marketing that just web presence. But how to decide which form of digital marketing is for you? Many people doesn't understand digital marketing in depth so they pay for ads on some sites, Google Ads and when it doesn't result with results they hoped, they give up. So how to approach to solution of this problem? First of all you need to define who are your key customers. What are your customers problems and what can you do to fix them? You found answer to this question? Great! Now you can start thinking on digital marketing. The most effective way is content marketing. Write valuable content, content that will reach your target customer and show them how you can solve their problems. Content marketing takes time, a lot of time, but is in the end one of the most effective ways of digital marketing.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Guidelines for a High-impact Business Strategy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Want to LearnHow to Make a High-impact Business Strategy? Here are Some Guidelines

What make s a good business strategy. First of all you need to determine your company vision, that is the first step. You need to ask yourself where I want to be in two, three or five years. What are my business goals, how will I measure them and it's achievement. After you defined that, you can start the business strategy creation. So what is business strategy? It is set of actions that you will perform that will enable you to fulfill your company's vision. So it is a set of steps that will guide you to your final goal. So is there only one strategy? No, company can have a lot of strategies, but all of them must be in alignment of company's vision, after all it's the tool for vision achievement. So how can company strategy have high positive impact on your business? It can have if it is properly defined. With clear set of processes, functions, dedicated people and performance metrics, you will be able to monitor your company's position and statistics in any time. This will enable you to adjust to market fluctuations and challenges on time, with minimum risk and maximum results.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
